alert.note: Alert for Klamath Basin (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 19 at 1:02PM PDT until April 20 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TO 10 PM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Klamath Basin including portions of Highways 140 and 97, Klamath Falls, Bonanza, and Worden. * WHEN...From 2 PM to 10 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
